name: ticketerbot
description: Ticketer Bot rewritten in TS with DiscordJS and DiscordAkairo

scripts.build: npm run lint && rm -rf dist && tsc
scripts.dev: npm run build:dev && node dist/app.js NODE_ENV=development
scripts.prod: npm run build && node dist/app.js NODE_ENV=production

husky.pre-commit: npm run prettier-format && npm run lint
